forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Sunny then Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms after 2pm. Mostly sunny. High near 86, with temperatures falling to around 84 in the afternoon. Southeast wind 2 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms before 8pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 68. South southeast wind 2 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
